price: (18) That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.[1741]
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ
footnotes: [1741]- i.e., any person or any secret you might attempt to conceal.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
